Claim: "The World Coal Association disputed the conclusion that stopping global warming calls for an end of coal use"
Implication: "The World Coal Association does not want to stop global warming"
Referring expressions: The World Coal Association, global warming, coal use  World Coal Association, global warming
Formula: (exists c (exists b (IsDisputed(b) and IsEnded(c)))) -> (exists d (exists a (DoesNotWantToStop(d) and IsGlobalWarming(a))))
